content: हृष् {c1c} {c4c} <ab>P.</ab> (हर्षति, हृष्यति, हृष्ट or हृषित) {@--1@} To be delighted or rejoiced, be pleased or glad, to exult, rejoice; अद्वितीयं रुचात्मानं मत्वा किं चंद्र हृष्यसि <ls>Bv. 2. 54.</ls> {@--2@} To bristle or stand erect, stand on end (as the hair of the body); हृषितास्तनूरुहाः <ls>Dk.</ls>; हृष्यंति रोमकूपानि <ls>Mb.</ls> {@--3@} To become erect (said of other things, {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} the penis). {@--4@} To lie, tell a lie. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (हर्षयति-ते) To please, delight, fill with pleasure.
